events.name: Intel Deep Learning Seminar
events.description: Learn the fundamentals of Machine Learning, Deep Learning & Artificial Intelligence focused on newly optimized frameworks for Intel Architecture like Intel® Software Optimization for neon™, Intel® Optimization for Caffe*, and Intel® Software Optimization for Theano* from professional and academic experts.

events.name: Introduction to Git Workshop
events.description: Douglas Duhaime will walk us through setup and the basics of how to use Git, a free tool that is key to projects in CS and beyond.

events.name: GamingTheSystem: Nintendo Talk and Dinner
events.description: Come learn about job and internship opportunities at Nintendo. After a company talk, join us for a dinner with Steve Rabin! Bring your resume!

events.name: Game ai architectures: a technical event
events.description: Steve Rabin will be outlining the Game AI architectures that revolutionized the gaming industry in this juicy technical talk.

events.name: Game.Art.Design: Artist Event
events.description: How do we animate flocks of birds or large schools of fish? How do computers generate realistic landscapes? Can computers be artists? Join us and Professor Steve Rabin as he explains some of the technology behind these and more.

events.name: Brains Behind the Games
events.description: Professor Rabin will give you an AI breakdown on any game you suggest!

events.name: Intro to Android Development Workshop
events.description: You'll learn how to set up Android Studio and create a basic to-do app.

events.name: Horizons School of Technology Careers-in-Tech Workshop
events.description: Want to learn how to build the foundations of a non-STEM and STEM career in tech? Join us for a Careers-in-Tech workshop from Horizons School of Technology!

events.name: Google Lightning Talks
events.description: Are you curious to learn more about the cool projects happening at Google? Join the Yale Computer Society for short product talks from Yale alumni Googlers!

events.name: First YCS Hack/Night of the Year
events.description: Come work on your CS projects or homework with other CS students!

events.name: Apple Iphone Announcement Livestream with YCS
events.description: Watch Apple announce the next iPhone with the Yale Computer Society!

events.name: YCS Presents: Tech Gala
events.description: Come to the 1st annual Tech Gala, an end-of-year celebration of computer science at Yale!

events.name: Facebook CodeLab
events.description: Interview workshop hosted by Yale alumni now working as Facebook engineers!

events.name: Hacknights Week 02
events.description: Come to Hacknights Week 02! Food/drinks provided.

events.name: Daniel Friedman
events.description: Thiel Fellow, Forbes 30 Under 30 Social Innovator, and CEO of Thinkful, an online coding bootcamp that combines face-to-face learning with the accessibility of online education.

events.name: Hacknights Week 01
events.description: Come to Hacknights Week 01! Food/drinks provided.

events.name: Yusuf Simonson
events.description: CTO at TheMuse (YCombinator W12), online jobs and career advice platform w/ 50M users and $28M in funding.

events.name: Hacknights Week 00
events.description: Join YCS for our inaugural Hack Nights! Code together with your friends on psets, projects, etc. while enjoying free food and drinks.

events.name: CS 477 Study Session
events.description: Study for the upcoming NLP midterm together!

events.name: CS 365 Study Session
events.description: Study for the upcoming CPSC 365 midterm with friends and Insomnia cookies!

events.name: YCS Grace Hopper Prize Info Session
events.description: Come to the first info session for the Grace Hopper Prize and the Alan Perlis Prize for Newcomers

events.name: Study sessions for finals
events.description: Come study with friends at the CEID. Check out our events on Facebook to find the times for you class. Lots of cookies await for you.

events.name: Interview Workshop I
events.description: Learn about the process of interviewing for the main tech companies, the coding challenges and how to prepare for them. Dinner (pizza & cookies) will be provided.

events.name: Julia Austin
events.description: CTO at DigitalOcean and Senior Lecturer at Harvard Business School. Previously at VMWare and Akamai.

events.name: Tom Lehman
events.description: CEO & Co-founder of Genius, formerly Rap Genius, the world’s biggest collection of song lyrics and crowdsourced musical knowledge.

events.name: Abhishek Chandra
events.description: CTO of Spring.Care, a healthcare company using data-driven technology to diagnose depression.
